mapper.insert: insert into paper(paper_title, paper_meeting, paper_date, paper_summary, paper_link, paper_type, paper_publisher_id, paper_publish_time) values (#{paperTitle}, #{paperMeeting}, #{paperDate}, #{paperSummary}, #{paperLink}, #{paperType}, #{paperPublisherId}, #{paperPublishTime})
mapper.update: update paper set paper_title=#{paperTitle}, paper_meeting=#{paperMeeting}, paper_date=#{paperDate}, paper_summary=#{paperSummary}, paper_link=#{paperLink}, paper_type=#{paperType}, paper_publisher_id=#{paperPublisherId}, paper_publish_time=#{paperPublishTime} where paper_id = #{paperId}
mapper.select:
select * from paper
where paper_title like concat('%',#{cond},'%')
inner join paper_rd where rd_id = #{cond}
where paper_summary like concat('%',#{cond},'%')
order by paper_date
order by paper_date desc
select author_name from paper_author where paper_id = #{paperId}
select citation_id from paper_citation where paper_id = #{paperId}
select rd_name from paper_rd inner join research_direction rd on paper_rd.rd_id = rd.rd_id where paper_id = #{paperId}
select file_path from paper_additional_file where paper_id = #{paperId}
